entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: https, plaintext, updates #58752
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58751
  • Too many of the same ACCELERATE KEYS (Alt+I) when creating a new project Blazor web app #58750
  • Exceptions from IHubActivator.Create are not being propagated to SignalR Client #58749
  • Compile Fails in 2022 Preview but works in 2022 #58748
  • Services injected with attribute derived from FromKeyedServicesAttribute appear as request body in swagger #58739
  • Introduce ability to disable response compression #58737

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #58665
  • Deprecated str.substr warning #58720
    10.0-preview1
  • Add a weather API call to the Blazor Web App template when global interactivity is enabled with WebAssembly/Auto #51204
    Backlog
  • Publishing Blazor WASM on .NET 8 Fails Due to Integrity Checks with Cloudflare Script Injection #58714
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #58707

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix local failure in GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #58747
    area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `df1544b` to `1204d63` #58746
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58745
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58744
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58743
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58742
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58741
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738
    area-networking
  • Fix flaky ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #58735
    area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58734
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Replaced Deprecated str.substr with str.substring in All Relevant Files #58732
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58510
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution
